description:
NIJISANJI EN's super sunny fairy virtual liver, Pomu Rainpuff!
にじさんじEN所属ぽむ＊れいんぱふです！
I'll be doing my best in becoming the world's strongest fairy!!! It's nice to meet you!!

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PomuRainpuff

#LazuLight #NIJISANJI_EN #NIJISANJI
